channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album

item.title: CVE-2024-35750|2024-06-08T12:37:30.658Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20image%20gallery%2C%20gallery%20album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31120|2024-03-31T18:48:30.646Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20image%20gallery%2C%20gallery%20album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.
